title: To the person who animated Galio's log-in screen
body: Huge props for the tail actually TURNING.  I mean, huge props in general for kickass animations for the log-ins but that simple flick of the tail and the changing of its angle is god damn impressive. Bravo.

replies.body: Galio's login screen and music are top notch! :D

The only thing I disliked about it is how weird and derpy the masked noxian (?) looked when he was trying to get away.
Also, Galio looks like he's trying to dive with his head into the ground when he lands to me
Did Galio take the city in the background with him? I can't see any of it before he lands.
Well the city isn't in the picture before he lands,but that windmill definetly spawns behind him xD
Yeah, but where is the house he breaks with tail on splash art?
